description: This Dart file defines the AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication functions such as login, registration, JWT storage, and retrieval for a Flutter application interfacing with a backend API.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Provides authentication-related functionalities including login, registration, JWT token management, and authorization header retrieval.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with email and password, storing the JWT token on success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with the provided email and password.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks whether the user is currently authenticated based on presence of stored JWT.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs the user out by deleting the stored JWT token.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _setJwtToken
methods.description: Stores the JWT token securely in local storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Reads the JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: getAuthHeader
methods.description: Returns authorization headers containing the bearer token for authenticated API requests.
